name: Weenie Roast
description:
You are a weenie at a BBQ. Try your best to survive the cookout.

Collect spray bottle power-ups to cool off. Don't get too cooked or you'll be one step closer to being lunch. 

Game was made for MS Paint's Jam after my friend JW said I should "make a game".

Controls: 

  • WASD to move
  • Space/left mouse to dash, dashing speeds up your cook state

1.0.1 

  • increased aggression of tongs
  • reduced cook from dash
  • added powerup sound
  • increased powerup pickup radius
  • added grill legs to grill in play area
